name: Who Are You? (itch) (Angelo Sanchez)
description:
A girl that had done the unthinkable, taken her own life. You travel through the keys moments of her life, that have made her take this action. But only after she travels through all these important moments of her life again does she realized she had made a huge mistake.

Who Are You? is an open world, narrative game set in limbo moments after she has taken her own life.

Walkthrough all of her keys moments that had let her into taking her own life. But after she travels through these moments for the second time in limbo she comes to the realization that she has made a mistake in doing so.

KEY FEATURES

*A compelling story that will pull on your heartstring and make you feel for the action of action she has taken.

*A really beautiful-looking world with tons of amazing colors.
